content: will drop it down @ludasamigurumi - all rights reserved for more information email me at ljuda lisnizkaja@gmail com 10 tail make a brush with dark brown yarn and put it into a magic ring with 6 single_crochet on it then pull off the magic_ring and make round 1-6 6sc*6 6 cut the yarn sew the tail to the back of the body @ludasamigurumi - all rights reserved for more information email me at ljuda lisnizkaja@gmail com 11 ©copyright all ludasamigurumi patterns are protected by international copyright laws and are intended for personal use only all rights reserved it is prohibited to distribute instructions on paper or electronically you may not sell or share the patterns do not post them on the internet or translate them into other languages you may sell any item made personally by you according to this pattern if you have any problems about this pattern please feel free to contact me thanks and enjoy @ludasamigurumi - all rights reserved for more information email me at ljuda lisnizkaja@gmail com
